discussion.author: erikmd
discussion.comment:
FYI the [GitLab CI pipeline](https://gitlab.com/math-comp/math-comp/-/pipelines/581464715) is now green :heavy_check_mark:

So given this PR only deals with the Docker-based GitLab CI, I think it can now be merged.

tags.description: Issue or PR about the CI. (Gitlab CI or CI of dependencies problems linked with math-comp)
